a.title: Email this link to a friend

div.p: San Bernardino County Superintendent of Schools has curated this remote learning resource hub for administrators, educational leaders, teachers, and families in response to COVID-19. It contains best practices and resources for distance learning and aligns closely with the distance learning guidance provided by the California Department of Education (CDE).
Please note: The hub will be updated regularly as new resources become available.
April 28, 2020 SBCSS PBIS Leadership Network - 10:00 a.m. - 11:30 a.m.
April 29, 2020 Online Engagement Strategies: Lesson Design for Distance Learning (Part 2) - 9 a.m. - 10 a.m.
May 4, 2020 Online Engagement Series: Building Community in Distance Learning 9 a.m. - 10 a.m.
May 6, 2020 Applied Digital Skills with Google (Virtual) - 1 p.m. - 2:30 p.m.
May 11 & 13, 2020 New CA K-12 Online Content Project - 9 a.m. - 11 a.m. both days
May 19, 2020 Virtual Fieldtrips for Distance Learning - 9 a.m. - 10 a.m.
May 21, 2020 Listen, Protect, Connect - 10:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m.
June 4, 2020 Parent Partnership Project: Wellness and Behavior - 10:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m.
A comprehensive listing of all CDE webinars related to the Coronavirus (COVID-19)

p.strong: Online Blended Teacher 10-week Instructor-led professional learning course

div.p: April 27, 2020 Leading Edge OBT
June 8, 2020 Leading Edge OBT
Leading Edge Flex (New self-paced, gamified professional learning experience)
